sentences.sContent: He was an unambitious man destined for a commonplace job.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was an unambitious man destined for a commonplace job.
sentences.sCn: 他是一个没有野心的人，注定要找一个平凡的工作。

sentences.sContent: The graceful preface was laced by a commonplace maid near the furnace in the palace without any trace of embrace.
sentences.sContent_eng: The graceful preface was laced by a commonplace maid near the furnace in the palace without any trace of embrace.
sentences.sCn: 这份优雅的前言是由一个平凡的侍女在宫殿里的火炉边，不留住拥抱过的痕迹而系上带子的。

synos.tran: 老生常谈；司空见惯的事；普通的东西

remMethod.val: common (普通) + place (地方) → 普通地方 → 平凡的
